title: Rifftrax Audio Only Remasters bsg4you
description:
Rifftrax.Audio.Only.Remasters.

PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNTIL READING THE FOLLOWING

THESE FILES ARE NOT VIDEOS

THEY ONLY CONTAIN REMASTERED AUDIO COMMENTARIES, SUBS, AND CHAPTERS

THEY ARE BEING POSTED TO ALLOW MUXING WITH OTHER VIDEO/AUDIO SOURCES

If you don't know what these are or you think it'd be too difficult to synch them, please simply download the complete mkv files with all the video and audio tracks.

These no-video Rifftrax commentaries are being provided by request in case someone wants to synch them with their own encodes of the movies. The commentary track contains a balanced master of the Rifftrax along with a stereo mix of the movie. These mka files are Matroska containers with NO VIDEO and only the Rifftrax mp3 commentaries, English subs, and chapters from  remasters. An mka can be muxed using MKVmerge with a user provided video/audio encode. The remux might require synch adjustment which can be easily applied within MKVmerge. Removing every "NO-" from an mka filename results in the filename for the complete file including video and movie only audio tracks.

This initial share contains the following mka files. This list can be expanded by request so please leave a comment or PM with the mka desired.

Star.Wars.Prequel.Trilogy.ep1-3.1999-2005.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2
Star.Wars.Original.Trilogy.ep4-6.1977-1983.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2
The.Day.After.Tomorrow.2004.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2
Twilight.Saga.Complete.2008-2012.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.v2

If a Rifftrax was enjoyable, you haven't paid for it and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing the riff or make a general donation via CCard, PPal, Bitcoin/Dogecoin/Litecoin or wallet payment apps at

Please check out other releases of Rifftrax, MST3K, Battlestar Galactica, Star Trek, Gotham, DC Comics, documentaries, and more at:  https://thepiratebay.org/user/bsg4you/  
and leave any corrections, criticism, comments and requests.

Thanks, bsg4you
